123 likes, 3 comments - biography on March 9, 2024: "Few directors are as respected and acclaimed as Martin Scorsese. 

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so exciting,‚Äù Scorsese said. ‚ÄúI mean you look back‚Äî10 nominations over the years, I honestly don‚Äôt know how that happened. I don‚Äôt know because you don‚Äôt make films for awards. You make the films the best way you can make them.‚Äù

At 81, Scorsese is the oldest person to be nominated for the directing award, with his newest movie, ‚ÄòKillers of the Flower Moon,‚Äô making this his 10th shot at the particular trophy.
